title: Looking for: all caps, decorative fonts; possibly Victorian, Vintage, or Western
author: dcotton

comments.content:
Woodwind, by Harold’s Fonts, comes close:  
 [http://haroldsfonts.com/groups/w/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416040248/http:/haroldsfonts.com/groups/w/ "http://haroldsfonts.com/groups/w/")
